analyzed: parittam dārum āruyha  yathā sīde mahaṇṇave
translated: The Elder Somamitta 🔽Just as one would board a small boat
and sink in the great ocean,🔽so one who is good at living
the lazy one of low energy.🔽One should live with the noble ones who are secluded,
with those who are ardent and meditative,
with those who are always energetic,
